title: Dark Fantasy Ambient Soundscapes Vol. 3
description: A collection of dark ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating a disturbing, mystical and dark atmosphere for your Dark Fantasy, Medieval Fantasy or Horror Game, containing seamless loops, non-looping soundscapes and one-shot sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/dark-fantasy-ambient-soundscapes-vol-3

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bie0l0thev5eyd7/MSE%20-%20Dark%20Fantasy%20Ambient%20Soundscapes%20Vol.%203.pdf?dl=0


A collection of dark ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating a disturbing, mystical and dark atmosphere for your Dark Fantasy, Medieval Fantasy or Horror Game, containing seamless loops, non-looping soundscapes and one-shot sounds.


The package contains 25 themes and 100 dark ambient sound effects.Â 

Each theme includes 4 sound effects independent of each other - a regular version of the soundscape, a loop version of the soundscape and 2 one-shot sounds. All 4 sounds of each theme are separately created sound effects, and there are 100 sounds in total.


Including:

  • 25 seamless loop soundscapes - sound effects lasting just over a minute.
  • 25 non-looping soundscapes - sound effects lasting about one and a half minutes.
  • 50 one-shot sounds - single sound effects that can be used for game events, impacts, tension build-ups, transitions.


Immerse your audience in darkness, creepy atmosphere with dark ambient soundscapes, melodic phrases of musical instruments, mystical voices, gloomy forest and eerie night.


These ambient soundscapes work great as a background, they will help you tell a story, increase tension, fill the atmosphere in game scenes. They can also be used for the background in the menu.


Feel free to experiment these sound effects in animations, trailers and game scenes of other genres, such as science fiction and post-apocalyptic atmospheres.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 100 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 25 soundscapes of the regular version
  • 25 soundscapes of the looped version
  • 50 one-shot sound effects
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects are set to loop

Minutes of audio provided: 77 minutes 07 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
